mapper.select: SELECT pt.id,pt.access_token accessToken, pt.default_name defaultName, pt.device_name deviceName, pt.device_type deviceType, pt.create_time createTime, pt.from_channel fromChannel, pt.id_number idNumber, pt.phone_number phoneNumber, pt.id id, pt.real_name realName, pt.show_name showName, pt.status status,pt.type type,pt.sex sex,pt.password password FROM life_passport.passport pt WHERE id in( SELECT pca.merchant_id from life_pos.pos_cashier_account pca WHERE pca.cashier_id=#{cashierId} UNION select #{cashierId} )
